issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description: The functions in Ti.Utils currently are restricted to take TiBlob and String as argument. More datatypes will be supported for those functions: streams, buffers and other datatypes that could be encoded in a valid way.
fields.summary: TiAPI: Support additional datatypes for the functions in Ti.Utils
fields.environment: Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.8.0 Master, Mac OS 10.6.8

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress in the past few years. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
